Malawian Pack

Involves a high fat, adequate-protein, low carbohydrate deit that allows the body to burn fat. Helps in weight loss, diabetes management and overal health.

Ugandan Pack

No animal products or dairy products in this diet. Involves fruits ,vegetables, rice, legumes ,dairy altenatives and many more

Grand Pack

Includes lean meat, fish, fruits,vegetables, nuts and seeds. The aim is to return to a way of eating that's more like what early humans ate.

Edos Pack

Includes lean meat, fish, fruits,vegetables, nuts and seeds. The aim is to return to a way of eating that's more like what early humans ate.
